kickstart.post:
/opt/stack/bin/stack add firewall network=all service=all \ protocol=all action=ACCEPT chain=INPUT rulename="LOOPBACK-NET" \ flags="-i lo" comment="Accept all traffic over loopback interface"
/opt/stack/bin/stack add firewall network=private service="all" \ protocol="all" action="ACCEPT" chain="INPUT" rulename="PRIVATE-NET" \ comment="Accept all traffic on private network"
/opt/stack/bin/stack add host firewall localhost \ rulename="PRIVATE-FORWARD" network=private \ service="all" protocol="all" action="ACCEPT" chain="FORWARD" \ comment="Allow private traffic forwarding"
/opt/stack/bin/stack add host firewall localhost network=all \ rulename=NON-PRIVATE-GANGLIA service="8649" \ protocol="udp" action="REJECT" chain="INPUT" \ comment="block ganglia traffic from non-private interfaces"
/opt/stack/bin/stack add host firewall localhost network=all \ rulename=NON-PRIVATE-MYSQL service="3306" \ protocol="tcp" action="REJECT" chain="INPUT" \ comment="block mysql traffic from non-private interfaces"
/opt/stack/bin/stack add host firewall localhost network=all \ rulename=NON-PRIVATE-FOUNDATION-MYSQL service="40000" \ protocol="tcp" action="REJECT" chain="INPUT" \ comment="block foundation mysql traffic from non-private interfaces"
/opt/stack/bin/stack add host firewall localhost network=all \ rulename=SUB-1024-TCP service="0:1023" protocol=tcp \ action="REJECT" chain=INPUT \ comment="Block all TCP traffic below port 1024"
/opt/stack/bin/stack add host firewall localhost network=all \ rulename=SUB-1024-UDP service="0:1023" protocol=udp \ action="REJECT" chain=INPUT \ comment="Block all UDP traffic below port 1024"

/opt/stack/bin/stack report host firewall localhost | \ /opt/stack/bin/stack report script \ attrs="{'Kickstart_PublicNetwork':'&Kickstart_PublicNetwork;', \ 'Kickstart_PublicNetmask':'&Kickstart_PublicNetmask;'}" \ > /tmp/do-firewall.sh
chmod a+x /tmp/do-firewall.sh /tmp/do-firewall.sh
